name: PcSupport247
overview:
Powered with a team of eminent Certified Engineers, Pc Support 247 is endeavored to the best of online tech-support service and make a hold on its targeted clientele by making its service a quality offering.

The array of online/on-call or chat support provided by Pc Support 247 ensures a remote assistance, which protects your PC accurately and efficiently, irrespective of the size of the issue and your location.

We provide technical support and software services which can be delivered remotely. We currently provide services all over United states, Canada & United Kingdom.

Our technical support services features include :

•24 x 7 integrated support through the telephone, email and chat

•Intelligent knowledgebase FAQs and solutions database used for information and troubleshooting purposes

•Service request management (the logging, prioritization, tracking, research, resolution or dispatch/escalation and follow-up of help desk cases)

•Escalations procedure management through voice and e-mail
